<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Convert float number to a date.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''numberToDate''' [year,time]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [year,time]: [[Array]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_date <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[numberToDate]] [2008,0.5324]; //[2008,7,13,7,49]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[dateToNumber]], [[getNumber]], [[isNumber]], [[parseNumber]], [[playersNumber]]
</value></part></template>
